title: The formation of stars and planets: Radiation hydrodynamical and magnetohydrodynamical simulations
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Findings were published in refereed journal papers. Animations and images provided at http://www.astro.ex.ac.uk/people/mbate Creative Economy,Education,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections Cultural
findingsText: This grant provided funding for research into star and planet formation. Via refereed journal articles. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Education
